title: 12 Months of Justice: The HMCTS 2024 Review

content.text: Join us for a special end-of-year review episode of Inside HMCTS, where we reflect on the justice highlights of 2024 across all jurisdictions.
From new systems and campaigns to the opening of additional courtrooms and significant events, we cover the progress and transformation within HMCTS.
Tune in to hear from our colleagues and special guests as we celebrate a year filled with achievements and look forward to the challenges and opportunities of 2025.
Listen to the latest episode now, available wherever you get your podcasts from!
A transcript of the podcast is also available.
Ymunwch â ni am bennod olaf Inside HMCTS am y flwyddyn, lle byddwn yn myfyrio ar uchafbwyntiau cyfiawnder 2024 ar draws yr holl awdurdodaethau.
O systemau ac ymgyrchoedd newydd, i agor ystafelloedd llys ychwanegol a digwyddiadau o bwys, byddwn yn trafod y cynnydd a’r trawsnewid o fewn GLlTEF.
Dewch i wrando ar ein cydweithwyr a gwesteion arbennig wrth i ni ddathlu blwyddyn llawn llwyddiannau ac yn edrych ymlaen i heriau a chyfleoedd 2025.
Gwrandewch ar y bennod ddiweddaraf nawr, ar gael o ble bynnag rydych chi'n gwrando ar eich podlediadau!
Mae trawsgrifiad o'r podlediad ar gael yma hefyd.
